channel.title: shortcuts on Andy Ibanez
channel.description: Recent content in shortcuts on Andy Ibanez

item.title: Implementing Parametrizable Shortcut Actions for your iOS Apps
item.description: All the way back to 2016, a group of very talented iOS developers released Workflow, a very popular app to let users create actions of different kinds within the system’s constraints. You could create and automate different tasks, such as controlling a server via SSH, downloading all the images from a website, and more… Much, much more. Apple saw the power of the app and acquired it in March 2017. This was very exciting, but we didn’t hear anything from the app since.
